gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: IceBridge Snow Radar L1B Geolocated Radar Echo Strength Profiles V002

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: NASA National Snow and Ice Data Center Distributed Active Archive Center

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This data set contains radar echograms taken from the Center for Remote Sensing of Ice Sheets (CReSIS) ultra wide-band snow radar over land and sea ice in the Arctic and Antarctic. The data were collected as part of Operation IceBridge funded campaigns.

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: Direct download, with optional registration page.
Tool to visualize, search, and download IceBridge data.
Note: Reverb will be replaced with Earthdata Search in September 2016. NASA search and order tool for subsetting, reprojecting, and reformatting data.
NASA's newest search and order tool for subsetting, reprojecting, and reformatting data.
